resources.string: Shell Island Resort - Wrightsville Beach, NC

Shell Island is the premier resort hotel at Wrightsville Beach, NC providing all oceanfront suites with 169 beautiful guest rooms, each overlooking the Atlantic Ocean. With an indoor and outdoor pool, jacuzzi, beach volleyball, and miles of white sandy beaches, Shell Island Resort is a wonderful place to come and relax while enjoying the sound of the waves. With all the amenities, and a casual oceanfront restaurant and bar complete with outdoor seating, a fitness room, and laundry facilities on site, you will see why our guests love to stay with us.
